reviewText: I thought it was great. Yes it does once or twice happen where they can't get into a camp but they tried their best at interviewing various people of age in the surrounding cities of those camps.
Using this to teach at the police academy on Threats Against Law Enforcement - these guys are nuts.  You probaly don't really want to know how nuts they are....coming to you from a compound near you.
Excellent video. Great for those who think Islam is a religion of peace. Many Americans an none muslims are being deceived by this silly notion.
This movie doesn't play.  I put it in my DVD player and got nothing.  I sure wish it would play because it probably is good.

A lot of old news that has been rehashed before......only a couple camps exposed which have already been closed or the leaders arrested......some where around 4 or 5 year old TV news story.......lots of postering and smack talk.......I believe the video shown about 10 women lined up shooting SKS's  at a tree stump in a shallow lake.....lots of water splashing......

It's okay I guess.  You follow a reporter from camp to camp and they won't let him in, what a surprise.  Actually, "Twilight in America" a kindle book is much better.  It's an in depth study that names, names and places and how America is funding them through Welfare Fraud.

This video is thorough in revealing the dozens of terrorist training camps already here in America.  In my state (Pa) I have contacted the governor, one senator and a local representative to inquire about what is being done about this.  We have one of these camps here in Pa. and I got NO response from any of them.  No one seems to care at all.  America is over!
